screenReaderLabel.description: Screenreader label for the overall navigation

debounce.description:
The rate (in ms) the component responds to container resizing or
an update to one of its child items

renderBeforeItems.description: Content to display before the navigation items, such as a logo

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| keyof ReactHTML | keyof ReactSVG | ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

renderAfterItems.description:
Content to display after the navigation items, aligned to the far end
of the navigation

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| keyof ReactHTML | keyof ReactSVG | ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

margin.description:
Valid values are `0`, `none`, `auto`, `xxx-small`, `xx-small`, `x-small`,
`small`, `medium`, `large`, `x-large`, `xx-large`. Apply these values via
familiar CSS-like shorthand. For example: `margin="small auto large"`.

elementRef.description: Provides a reference to the underlying nav element

renderTruncateLabel.description:
Customize the text displayed in the menu trigger when links overflow
the overall nav width.

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| keyof ReactHTML | keyof ReactSVG | ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

onUpdate.description:
Called whenever the navigation items are updated or the size of
the navigation changes. Passes in the `visibleItemsCount` as
a parameter.

visibleItemsCount.description: Sets the number of navigation items that are visible.

title: AppNav
